description: An elephant uses its trunk to dangle a small alligator high above a river bank. Below, two other alligators in the water observe the scene, one appearing to offer advice. This creates an absurd scenario where the typical predator-prey relationship is inverted in a bizarre fishing expedition. The alligators' seemingly helpful commentary on the elephant's technique adds a layer of surreal humor. The image depicts an unusual and unexpected interaction within the animal kingdom.
caption: "Hang on, Bernard! You've got him! ... Give him slack!"
